title: (x) The Three Weeks Series cover - Mantinia (customised) {Nick Cooke}
content:
Any idea on the words THREE WEEKS?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fs470.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=fs470.jpg) | 20.38 KB |
author: Sruly P

comments.content: That type isn’t a typeface its custom lettering. You could probably start with Times Roman in Illustrator and recreate those two words. If it becomes a popular look someone will make a knock off and post it at da fonts.

I think it started as Mantinia.

Nick Cooke
